comments.comment: It seems a problem reported at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyinstaller/pyinstaller/issues/3219>pyinstaller/pyinstaller#3219</denchmark-link> .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/SiyuChen1>@SiyuChen1</denchmark-link> I merged <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/pull/221>#221</denchmark-link> . Could you try again with following commands? <denchmark-code># Setup conda conda create --name labelme python==3.6.0 conda activate labelme
# Build the standalone executable pip install . pip install pyinstaller pyinstaller labelme.spec dist/labelme --version </denchmark-code>
I tested this on Ubuntu 16.04.

Could you try below?
pip uninstall pyqt5 conda install pyqt

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro>@wkentaro</denchmark-link> I follow the steps "How to build standalone executable": when i run this comand: pyinstaller labelme.spec It has the error as below. how can i slove it?. thanks u. 20 INFO: checking Analysis 20 INFO: Building Analysis because Analysis-00.toc is non existent 20 INFO: Initializing module dependency graph... 21 INFO: Caching module graph hooks... 23 INFO: Analyzing base_library.zip ... 1391 INFO: Caching module dependency graph... 1416 ERROR: base_library.zip could not be created! . . .
